item.description:
Next meeting will be on September 29th Thursday at 7 PM. 

Several people have asked that I do a demo of stretching for your aches and pains so I will be doing a mini class on this, about 20 minutes.  Bring a mat for more floor padding if you can get up and down from the floor.  I will modify some of the stretches to be done in chairs for those that aren't confident on getting up and down.

We will have our regular sharing and caring until 8:30 then we will finish up the meeting with stretching and deep breathing to calming music!

See you there.

Betsy

 

Donations are always welcome to help me defray meetup.com costs and rental costs.
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs. There is an elevator on the right as you come in on the first level
item.name: Time for the meetup
